title: Fragments, "The Drinkers", ca. 1785
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation with further colors added by brush
dimensions:
A. Warp: 65.5 cm (25 3/4 in.). Weft: 68.5 cm (27 in.)
B. Warp: 39.5 cm (15 1/2 in.). Weft: 52 cm (20 1/2 in.)
C. Warp: 78 cm (30 3/4 in.). Weft: 29.5 cm (11 1/2 in.)
D. Warp: 53 cm (21 in.). Weft: 91 cm (36 in.)
E. Warp: 27 cm (10 1/2 in.). Weft: 52 cm (220 1/2 in.)
F. Warp: 59.5 cm (23 1/2 in.). Weft: 53 cm (20 3/4 in.)
G. Warp: 27 cm (10 1/2 in.). Weft: 36.5 cm (14 1/4in.)
H. Warp: 30.5 cm (12 in.). Weft: 39 cm (15 1/4 in.)
I. Warp: 18 cm (7 in.). Weft: 26 cm (10 1/4 in.)
J. Warp: 28 cm (11 in.). Weft: 23 cm (9 in.). All edges cut.
description: Series of isolated scenes of people and animals drinking; some from a fountain, some from a jug, some from wine bottles and glasses. Rustic buildings. Polychrome on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, "The Drinkers", ca. 1785.
ca. 1785. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation with further colors added by brush. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-78-a/j.
